item.title: Bulletin updated at 12:16 HKT 12/08/2022
item.description:
At noon at the Hong Kong Observatory :
Air temperature : 25 degrees Celsius
Relative Humidity : 93 per cent
During the past hour the mean UV Index recorded at King's Park : 0.1
Intensity of UV radiation : low

Though rainstorm warning has been cancelled, people should stay alert to the danger that may be brought about by river flooding.

Please be reminded that:
The Thunderstorm Warning has been issued. It will remain effective until 1:00 p.m. today. A few squally thunderstorms are expected to occur over Hong Kong.
